mapper.select: SELECT ZJ, YHBH, JSBH, JLZT, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ FROM PF_ROLE_STAFF WHERE YHBH = #{yhbh,jdbcType=CHAR} AND JSBH = #{jsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JLZT = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into PF_ROLE_STAFF (ZJ, YHBH, JSBH,JLZT, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR,ZHXGSJ) values (#{zj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhbh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cjr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhxgr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zhxgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
